column7: 2015 at his home on stoney brook road after a long illness. he was born in boston
column9: 1974. he spent his early years in winchester
column10: ma while spending summers in the sunapee area and moving here 10 years ago. billy graduated from belmont hill school in 1993. he earned a ba degree from skidmore college in 1997 and received his mba from william and mary business school in 2004. over the years he has worked in marketing for several different companies. he is a former member of the lake sunapee yacht club. billy was kind
column11: sensitive and loving. he is survived by his parents
column12: william and adele dee. dee (pardee) cunningham
column15: fl; a sister and her husband
column16: margaret and ted lyon of winchester
column21: uncles and cousins. a mass of christian burial will be celebrated on friday

column26: nh. burial for immediate family will follow in west part cemetery
column27: new london. everyone is invited to join the family at the lake sunapee yacht club following the mass. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 chadwick funeral and cremation service llc. funeral home website by batesville
